entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is being raised into the air and his wand is still connected to Harry's by a thread of shimmering golden light. (The text states: "He and Voldemort were both being raised into the air, their wa nds still connected by that thread of shimmering golden light.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being raised into the air and his wand is still connected to Voldemort's by a thread of shimmering golden light. (The text states: "He and Voldemort were both being raised into the air, their wa nds still connected by that thread of shimmering golden light.")

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort who are shouting and asking for instructions. (The text states: "The Death Eaters were shouting; they we re asking Voldemort fo r instructions;")

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are connected by a thread of shimmering golden light. (The text states: "He and Voldemort were both being raised into the air, their wa nds still connected by that thread of shimmering golden light.")

Harry is surrounded by Death Eaters who are closing in and reforming the circle around him. (The text states: "The Death Eaters were shouting; they we re asking Voldemort fo r instructions; they were closing in, reforming the circ le around Harry and Voldemort,")

Voldemort is surrounded by Death Eaters who are closing in and reforming the circle around him. (The text states: "The Death Eaters were shouting; they we re asking Voldemort fo r instructions; they were closing in, reforming the circ le around Harry and Voldemort,")
